title: Chiropractor Nashville TN | Special Offer for New Patients
description: Nashville TN Chiropractors focused on results. Contact the team at Power Chiropractic & Wellness today for experienced chiropractic care.
cleaned_text: Chiropractor Nashville TN Power Chiropractic & Wellness Welcome to Power Chiropractic & Wellness located at 4117 Gallatin Pike in Nashville, TN. We understand that choosing a chiropractor is a big decision. This article will help you learn the basics of chiropractic care. Please don't hesitate to contact our [Nashville TN chiropractors](/) with any further questions you have. We are here to help you achieve your goals. Most people believe that chiropractors treat back pain. That is true, but there is so much more that chiropractic care can achieve. Because chiropractors help to remove pressure from the nervous system, they can also influence many other conditions. It is common to hear chiropractic patients say that they came in for back pain and their headaches got better. Chiropractic Explained If you are looking for an explanation of how chiropractic care works this paragraph is for you. A concise scientific explanation of [chiropractic](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chiropractic) is that adjustments directly affect muscle and bone structures by reducing pain and increasing joint motion. That's a lot to take in, but it is the explanation as to why some chiropractic patients in Nashville TN report improvement in body function. This is not a claim that chiropractic adjustments treat disease, but it does suggest that some people will see improvements in conditions that are outside of the treatment area. Trusted Chiropractor: Read Our Reviews chiropractic care for a better lifestyle
